original: Theravāda Vinayapiṭaka
analyzed: thera vāda vinaya piṭaka

original: Mahāvagga
analyzed: mahāvagga

original: 6. Bhesajjakkhandhaka
analyzed: bhesajjakkhandhaka

original: 1. Pañcabhesajjakathā
analyzed: pañca bhesajja kathā

original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhūnaṁ sāradikena ābādhena phuṭṭhānaṁ yāgupi pītā uggacchati, bhattampi bhuttaṁ uggacchati.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhikkhūnam sāradikena ābādhena phuṭṭhānam yāgu pi pītā uggacchati bhattam pi bhuttam uggacchati

original: Te tena kisā honti, lūkhā, dubbaṇṇā, uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātā, dhamanisanthatagattā.
analyzed: te tena kisāḥ honti lūkhāḥ dubbaṇṇāḥ uppaṇḍu paṇḍuka jātāḥ dhamani santhata gattā

original: Addasā kho bhagavā te bhikkhū kise lūkhe dubbaṇṇe uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajāte dhamanisanthatagatte, disvāna āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi—
analyzed: addasā kho bhagavā te bhikkhū kise lūkhe dubbaṇṇe uppaṇḍu paṇḍuka jāte dhamani santhata gatte disvāna āyasmantam ānandam āmantesi

original: “kiṁ nu kho, ānanda, etarahi bhikkhū kisā, lūkhā, dubbaṇṇā, uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātā, dhamanisanthatagattā”ti?
analyzed: kim nu kho ānanda etarahi bhikkhū kisā lūkhāḥ dubbaṇṇāḥ uppaṇḍu paṇḍuka jātāḥ dhamani santhata gattā ati

original: “Etarahi, bhante, bhikkhūnaṁ sāradikena ābādhena phuṭṭhānaṁ yāgupi pītā uggacchati, bhattampi bhuttaṁ uggacchati.
analyzed: etarahi bhante bhikkhūnam sāradikena ābādhena phuṭṭhānam yāgu pi pītā uggacchati bhattam pi bhuttam uggacchati

original: Te tena kisā honti, lūkhā, dubbaṇṇā, uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātā, dhamanisanthatagattā”ti.
analyzed: te tena kisāḥ honti lūkhāḥ dubbaṇṇāḥ uppaṇḍu paṇḍuka jātāḥ dhamani santhata gattā ati

original: Atha kho bhagavato rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi—
analyzed: atha kho bhagavataḥ rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evam cetasaḥ parivitakkaḥ udapādi

original: “etarahi kho bhikkhūnaṁ sāradikena ābādhena phuṭṭhānaṁ yāgupi pītā uggacchati, bhattampi bhuttaṁ uggacchati.
analyzed: etarahi kho bhikkhūnam sāradikena ābādhena phuṭṭhānam yāgu pi pītā uggacchati bhattam pi bhuttam uggacchati

original: Te tena kisā honti, lūkhā, dubbaṇṇā, uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātā, dhamanisanthatagattā.
analyzed: te tena kisāḥ honti lūkhāḥ dubbaṇṇāḥ uppaṇḍu paṇḍuka jātāḥ dhamani santhata gattā

original: Kiṁ nu kho ahaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ bhesajjaṁ anujāneyyaṁ, yaṁ bhesajjañceva assa bhesajjasammatañca lokassa, āhāratthañca phareyya, na ca oḷāriko āhāro paññāyeyyā”ti?
analyzed: kim nu kho aham bhikkhūnam bhesajjam anujāneyya yam bhesajjam ca iva assa bhesajja sammatam ca lokassa āhāra attham ca phareyya na ca oḷārikaḥ āhāro paññāyeyya ati

original: Atha kho bhagavato etadahosi—
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavataḥ

original: “imāni kho pañca bhesajjāni, seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: imāni kho pañca bhesajjāni

original: sappi, navanītaṁ, telaṁ, madhu, phāṇitaṁ;
analyzed: sappi navanīta tela madhu phāṇita

original: bhesajjāni ceva bhesajjasammatāni ca lokassa, āhāratthañca pharanti, na ca oḷāriko āhāro paññāyati.
analyzed: bhesajjāni ca iva bhesajja sammatāni ca lokassa āhāra atthañca pharanti na ca oḷārikaḥ āhāro paññāyati

original: Yannūnāhaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ imāni pañca bhesajjāni anujāneyyaṁ, kāle paṭiggahetvā kāle paribhuñjitun”ti.
analyzed: yat nūna aham bhikkhūnam imāni pañca bhesajjāni anujāneyya kāle paṭiggahetvā kāle paribhuñjitun ti

original: Atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā sāyanha samayam paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitaḥ etasmim nidāne etasmim pakaraṇe dhammim katham katvā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “idha mayhaṁ, bhikkhave, rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi—
analyzed: idha bhikkhave rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evam cetasaḥ parivitakkaḥ udapādi

original: ‘etarahi kho bhikkhūnaṁ sāradikena ābādhena phuṭṭhānaṁ yāgupi pītā uggacchati, bhattampi bhuttaṁ uggacchati.
analyzed: etarahi kho bhikkhūnam sāradikena ābādhena phuṭṭhānam yāgu pi pītā uggacchati bhattam pi bhuttam uggacchati

original: Te tena kisā honti, lūkhā, dubbaṇṇā, uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātā, dhamanisanthatagattā.
analyzed: te tena kisāḥ honti lūkhāḥ dubbaṇṇāḥ uppaṇḍu paṇḍuka jātāḥ dhamani santhata gattā

original: Kiṁ nu kho ahaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ bhesajjaṁ anujāneyyaṁ, yaṁ bhesajjañceva assa bhesajjasammatañca lokassa, āhāratthañca phareyya, na ca oḷāriko āhāro paññāyeyyā’ti.
analyzed: kim nu kho aham bhikkhūnam bhesajjam anujāneyya yam bhesajjam ca iva assa bhesajja sammatam ca lokassa āhāra attham ca phareyya na ca oḷārikaḥ āhāro paññāyeyya ati

original: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhave, etadahosi—
analyzed: tassa bhikkhave etat ahosi

original: ‘imāni kho pañca bhesajjāni, seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: imāni kho pañca bhesajjāni

original: sappi, navanītaṁ, telaṁ, madhu, phāṇitaṁ;
analyzed: sappi navanīta tela madhu phāṇita

original: bhesajjāni ceva bhesajjasammatāni ca lokassa, āhāratthañca pharanti, na ca oḷāriko āhāro paññāyati.
analyzed: bhesajjāni ca iva bhesajja sammatāni ca lokassa āhāra atthañca pharanti na ca oḷārikaḥ āhāro paññāyati

original: Yannūnāhaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ imāni pañca bhesajjāni anujāneyyaṁ, kāle paṭiggahetvā kāle paribhuñjitun’ti.
analyzed: yat nūna aham bhikkhūnam imāni pañca bhesajjāni anujāneyya kāle paṭiggahetvā kāle paribhuñjitun ti

original: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tāni pañca bhesajjāni kāle paṭiggahetvā kāle paribhuñjitun”ti.
analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave tāni pañca bhesajjāni kāle paṭiggahetvā kāle paribhuñjitun ti

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū tāni pañca bhesajjāni kāle paṭiggahetvā kāle paribhuñjanti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū tāni pañca bhesajjāni kāle paṭiggahetvā kāle paribhuñjanti

original: Tesaṁ yānipi tāni pākatikāni lūkhāni bhojanāni tānipi nacchādenti, pageva senesitāni.
analyzed: tesam yāni api tāni pākatikāni lūkhāni bhojanāni tāni api na chādenti pagā iva senā īsitāni

original: Te tena ceva sāradikena ābādhena phuṭṭhā, iminā ca bhattācchādakena, tadubhayena bhiyyoso mattāya kisā honti, lūkhā, dubbaṇṇā, uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātā, dhamanisanthatagattā.
analyzed: te tena ca iva sāradikena ābādhena phuṭṭhāḥ iminā ca bhattācchādakena tad ubhayena bhiyyosaḥ mattāya kisāḥ honti lūkhāḥ dubbaṇṇāḥ uppaṇḍu paṇḍuka jātāḥ dhamani santhata gattāḥ

original: Addasā kho bhagavā te bhikkhū bhiyyoso mattāya kise lūkhe dubbaṇṇe uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajāte dhamanisanthatagatte, disvāna āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi—
analyzed: addasā kho bhagavā te bhikkhū bhiyyosaḥ mattāya kise lūkhe dubbaṇṇe uppaṇḍu paṇḍuka jāte dhamani santhata gatte disvānaḥ āyasmantam ānandam āmantesi

original: “kiṁ nu kho, ānanda, etarahi bhikkhū bhiyyoso mattāya kisā, lūkhā, dubbaṇṇā, uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātā, dhamanisanthatagattā”ti?
analyzed: kim nu kho ānanda etarahi bhikkhū bhiyyosaḥ mattāya kisāḥ lūkhāḥ dubbaṇṇāḥ uppaṇḍu paṇḍuka jātāḥ dhamani santhata gattā ati

original: “Etarahi, bhante, bhikkhū tāni ca pañca bhesajjāni kāle paṭiggahetvā kāle paribhuñjanti.
analyzed: etarahi bhante bhikkhū tāni ca pañca bhesajjāni kāle paṭiggahetvā kāle paribhuñjanti

original: Tesaṁ yānipi tāni pākatikāni lūkhāni bhojanāni tānipi nacchādenti, pageva senesitāni.
analyzed: tesam yāni api tāni pākatikāni lūkhāni bhojanāni tāni api na chādenti pagā iva senā īsitāni

original: Te tena ceva sāradikena ābādhena phuṭṭhā, iminā ca bhattācchādakena, tadubhayena bhiyyoso mattāya kisā, lūkhā, dubbaṇṇā, uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātā, dhamanisanthatagattā”ti.
analyzed: te tena ca iva sāradikena ābādhena phuṭṭhāḥ iminā ca bhatta ācchādakena tad ubhayena bhiyyosaḥ mattāya kisāḥ lūkhāḥ dubbaṇṇāḥ uppaṇḍu paṇḍuka jātāḥ dhamani santhata gattāḥ ati

original: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etasmim nidāne etasmim pakaraṇe dhammim katham katvā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tāni pañca bhesajjāni paṭiggahetvā kālepi vikālepi paribhuñjitun”ti.
analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave tāni pañca bhesajjāni paṭiggahetvā kāle pi vikāle pi paribhuñjitun ti

original: Tena kho pana samayena gilānānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ vasehi bhesajjehi attho hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena gilānānam bhikkhūnam vasehi bhesajjehi atthaḥ hoti

original: Bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
analyzed: bhagavato etam attham ārocesu

original: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, vasāni bhesajjāni—
analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave vasāni bhesajjāni

original: acchavasaṁ, macchavasaṁ, susukāvasaṁ, sūkaravasaṁ, gadrabhavasaṁ—
analyzed: acchavasa macchavasa susukāvasa sūkaravasa gadrabhavasa

original: kāle paṭiggahitaṁ kāle nippakkaṁ kāle saṁsaṭṭhaṁ telaparibhogena paribhuñjituṁ.
analyzed: kāle paṭiggahitam kāle nippakkam kāle sa saṭṭham tela paribhogena paribhuñjitu

original: Vikāle ce, bhikkhave, paṭiggahitaṁ vikāle nippakkaṁ vikāle saṁsaṭṭhaṁ, tañce paribhuñjeyya, āpatti tiṇṇaṁ dukkaṭānaṁ.
analyzed: vikāle ce bhikkhave paṭiggahitam vikāle nippakkam vikāle tat ce paribhuñjeyya āpatti tiṇṇam dukkaṭāna

original: Kāle ce, bhikkhave, paṭiggahitaṁ vikāle nippakkaṁ vikāle saṁsaṭṭhaṁ, tañce paribhuñjeyya, āpatti dvinnaṁ dukkaṭānaṁ.
analyzed: kāle ce bhikkhave paṭiggahitam vikāle nippakkam vikāle tat ce paribhuñjeyya āpatti dvinnam dukkaṭāna

original: Kāle ce, bhikkhave, paṭiggahitaṁ kāle nippakkaṁ vikāle saṁsaṭṭhaṁ, tañce paribhuñjeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: kāle ce bhikkhave paṭiggahitam kāle nippakkam vikāle tat ce paribhuñjeyya āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Kāle ce, bhikkhave, paṭiggahitaṁ kāle nippakkaṁ kāle saṁsaṭṭhaṁ, tañce paribhuñjeyya, anāpattī”ti.
analyzed: kāle ce bhikkhave paṭiggahitam kāle nippakkam kāle tat ce paribhuñjeyya anāpatti iti

analyzed: mūla ādi bhesajja kathā

original: Bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
analyzed: bhagavato etam attham ārocesu

analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave mūlāni bhesajjāni

original: Asati paccaye paribhuñjantassa āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti.
analyzed: asati paccaye paribhuñjantassa āpatti dukkaṭassa ati

original: Tena kho pana samayena gilānānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ mūlehi bhesajjehi piṭṭhehi attho hoti.

analyzed: bhagavato etam attham ārocesu

analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave nisadam nisada potakanti

analyzed: tena kho pana samayena gilānānam bhikkhūnam kasāvehi bhesajjehi atthaḥ hoti

original: Bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.

analyzed: bhagavato etam attham ārocesu

original: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, loṇāni bhesajjāni—

original: 3. Pilindavacchavatthu
analyzed: pilindavacchavatthu

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā pilindavaccho rājagahe pabbhāraṁ sodhāpeti leṇaṁ kattukāmo.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena āyasmā pilindavacchaḥ rājagahe pabbhāram sodhāpeti leṇam kattu kāmo

original: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro yenāyasmā pilindavaccho tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ pilindavacchaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: atha khalu rājā māgadhaḥ seniyaḥ bimbisāraḥ yena āyasmā pilindavacchaḥ tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam pilindavaccham abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro āyasmantaṁ pilindavacchaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnaḥ khalu rājā māgadhaḥ seniyaḥ bimbisāraḥ āyasmantam pilindavaccham etat avoca

original: “kiṁ, bhante, thero kārāpetī”ti?
analyzed: ki bhante thero kārāpeti iti

original: “Pabbhāraṁ, mahārāja, sodhāpemi, leṇaṁ kattukāmo”ti.
analyzed: pabbhāra mahā rāja sodhāpemi leṇam kattu kāmaḥ iti

original: “Attho, bhante, ayyassa ārāmikenā”ti?
analyzed: atthaḥ bhante ayyassa ārāmikena ati

original: “Na kho, mahārāja, bhagavatā ārāmiko anuññāto”ti.
analyzed: na kho mahā rāja bhagavatā ārāmikaḥ anuññātaḥ ti

original: “Tena hi, bhante, bhagavantaṁ paṭipucchitvā mama āroceyyāthā”ti.
analyzed: tena hi bhante bhagavantam paṭipucchitvā mama āroceyyātha ati

original: “Evaṁ, mahārājā”ti kho āyasmā pilindavaccho rañño māgadhassa seniyassa bimbisārassa paccassosi.
analyzed: eva mahā rāja ati kho āyasmā pilindavacchaḥ raññaḥ māgadhassa seniyassa bimbisārassa paccassosi

original: Atha kho āyasmā pilindavaccho rājānaṁ māgadhaṁ seniyaṁ bimbisāraṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi, samādapesi, samuttejesi, sampahaṁsesi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā pilindavacchaḥ rājānam māgadham seniyam bimbisāram dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahasesi

original: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro āyasmatā pilindavacchena dhammiyā kathāya
analyzed: atha kho rājā māgadhaḥ seniyaḥ bimbisāraḥ āyasmatā pilindavacchena dhammiyā kathāya

original: sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṁsito uṭṭhāyāsanā āyasmantaṁ pilindavacchaṁ
analyzed: sandassitaḥ samādapitaḥ samuttejitaḥ sampahasitaḥ uṭṭhāya āsanā āyasmantam pilinda vaccha

original: abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
analyzed: abhivādetvā padakkhiṇam katvā pakkāmi

original: Atha kho āyasmā pilindavaccho bhagavato santike dūtaṁ pāhesi—
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā pilindavacchaḥ bhagavatoḥ santike dūtam pāhesi

original: “rājā, bhante, māgadho seniyo bimbisāro ārāmikaṁ dātukāmo.
analyzed: rājā bhante māgadhaḥ seniyaḥ bimbisāraḥ ārāmikam dātu kāmaḥ

original: Kathaṁ nu kho, bhante, mayā paṭipajjitabban”ti?
analyzed: katham nu kho bhante mayā paṭipajjitabbanti

original: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etasmim nidāne etasmim pakaraṇe dhammim katham katvā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ārāmikan”ti.
analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave ārāmikanti

original: Dutiyampi kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro yenāyasmā pilindavaccho tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ pilindavacchaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: dutiyam pi kho rājā māgadhaḥ seniyaḥ bimbisāraḥ yena āyasmā pilindavaccho tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam pilindavaccham abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro āyasmantaṁ pilindavacchaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnaḥ khalu rājā māgadhaḥ seniyaḥ bimbisāraḥ āyasmantam pilindavaccham etat avoca

original: “anuññāto, bhante, bhagavatā ārāmiko”ti?
analyzed: anuññātaḥ bhante bhagavatā ārāmikā iti

original: “Evaṁ, mahārājā”ti.
analyzed: eva mahārājāti

original: “Tena hi, bhante, ayyassa ārāmikaṁ dammī”ti.
analyzed: tena hi bhante ayyassa ārāmikam dammi iti

original: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro āyasmato pilindavacchassa ārāmikaṁ paṭissutvā, vissaritvā, cirena satiṁ paṭilabhitvā, aññataraṁ sabbatthakaṁ mahāmattaṁ āmantesi—
analyzed: atha kho rājā māgadhaḥ seniyaḥ bimbisāraḥ āyasmataḥ pilindavacchassa ārāmikam paṭissutvā vissaritvā cirena satim paṭilabhitvā aññataram sabbatthakam mahāmattam āmantesi

original: “yo mayā, bhaṇe, ayyassa ārāmiko paṭissuto, dinno so ārāmiko”ti?
analyzed: yaḥ mayā bhaṇe ayyassa ārāmiko paṭissuto dinno saḥ ārāmiko ti

original: “Na kho, deva, ayyassa ārāmiko dinno”ti.
analyzed: na kho deva ayyassa ārāmikaḥ dinno ti

original: “Kīva ciraṁ nu kho, bhaṇe, ito hi taṁ hotī”ti?
analyzed: kīva ciram nu khalu bhaṇe itas hi tam iti

original: Atha kho so mahāmatto rattiyo gaṇetvā rājānaṁ māgadhaṁ seniyaṁ bimbisāraṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: atha kho saḥ mahāmattaḥ rattiyaḥ gaṇetvā rājānam māgadham seniyam bimbisāram etat avoca

original: “pañca, deva, rattisatānī”ti.
analyzed: pañca deva ratti satāni iti

original: “Tena hi, bhaṇe, ayyassa pañca ārāmikasatāni dehī”ti.
analyzed: tena hi bhaṇe ayyassa pañca ārāmika satāni dehi iti

original: “Evaṁ, devā”ti
analyzed: eva deva ati

original: kho so mahāmatto rañño māgadhassa seniyassa bimbisārassa paṭissutvā āyasmato pilindavacchassa pañca ārāmikasatāni pādāsi, pāṭiyekko gāmo nivisi.

original: pokkharaṇiyā tīre pāturahosi.
analyzed: pokkharaṇiyā tīre

original: Addasā kho aññataro nāgo āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ, disvāna āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: addasā kho aññataraḥ nāgaḥ āyasmantam mahāmoggallānam dūratas uva āgacchanta disvānaḥ āyasmantam mahāmoggallānam etat avoca

original: “etu kho, bhante, ayyo mahāmoggallāno. Svāgataṁ, bhante, ayyassa mahāmoggallānassa.
analyzed: etu kho bhante ayyaḥ mahāmoggallāno svāgata bhante ayyassa mahāmoggallānassa

original: Kena, bhante, ayyassa attho;
analyzed: kena bhante ayyassa attho

original: kiṁ dammī”ti?
analyzed: kim dammi iti

original: “Bhisehi ca me, āvuso, attho, muḷālikāhi cā”ti.
analyzed: bhisehi ca me āvuso atthaḥ muḷālikāhi ca ati

original: Atha kho so nāgo aññataraṁ nāgaṁ āṇāpesi—
analyzed: atha kho so nāgaḥ aññataram nāgam āṇāpesi

original: “tena hi, bhaṇe, ayyassa bhise ca muḷālikāyo ca yāvadatthaṁ dehī”ti.
analyzed: tena hi bhaṇe ayyassa bhise ca muḷālikāyo ca yāvadattham dehi iti

original: Atha kho so nāgo mandākiniṁ pokkharaṇiṁ ogāhetvā, soṇḍāya bhisañca muḷālikañca abbāhitvā, suvikkhālitaṁ vikkhāletvā, bhaṇḍikaṁ bandhitvā yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno tenupasaṅkami.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ nāgaḥ mandākinim pokkharaṇim ogāhetvā soṇḍāya bhisam ca muḷālikam ca abbāhitvā su vikkhālitam vikkhāletvā bhaṇḍikam bandhitvā yena ayasmai mahāmoggallānaḥ tena upasaṅkami

original: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno—seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṁ vā bāhaṁ
analyzed: atha kho āyasmai mahāmoggallāna useyyathā api nāma balavā purisaḥ samiñjitam vā bāha

original: pasāreyya, pasāritaṁ vā bāhaṁ samiñjeyya; evameva—mandākiniyā pokkharaṇiyā tīre antarahito
analyzed: pasāreyya pasāritam vā bāham samiñjeyya evam eva mandākiniyā pokkharaṇiyā tīre antarahitaḥ

original: jetavane pāturahosi.
analyzed: jetavane

original: Sopi kho nāgo mandākiniyā pokkharaṇiyā tīre antarahito jetavane pāturahosi.
analyzed: saḥ api kho nāgaḥ mandākiniyā pokkharaṇiyā tīre antarahitaḥ jetavane pātuḥ ahosi

original: Atha kho so nāgo āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa bhise ca muḷālikāyo ca paṭiggahāpetvā jetavane antarahito mandākiniyā pokkharaṇiyā tīre pāturahosi.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ nāgaḥ āyasmataḥ mahāmoggallānassa bhise ca muḷālikāyo ca paṭiggahāpetvā jetavane antarahitaḥ mandākiniyā pokkharaṇiyā tīre pāturahosi

original: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno āyasmato sāriputtassa bhise ca muḷālikāyo ca upanāmesi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallānaḥ āyasmataḥ sāriputtassa bhise ca muḷālikāyo ca upanāmesi

original: Atha kho āyasmato sāriputtassa bhise ca muḷālikāyo ca bhuttassa kāyaḍāhābādho paṭippassambhi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmato sāriputtassa bhise ca muḷālikāyo ca bhuttassa kāya ḍāha ābādho paṭippassambhi

original: Bahū bhisā ca muḷālikāyo ca avasiṭṭhā honti.
analyzed: bahū bhisā ca muḷālikāyo ca avasiṭṭhā honti

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū dubbhikkhe appamattakepi pavārenti, paṭisaṅkhāpi paṭikkhipanti, sabbo ca saṅgho pavārito hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū dubbhikkhe appamattake api pavārenti paṭisaṅkhā api paṭikkhipanti sabbaḥ ca saṅghaḥ pavāritaḥ hoti

original: Bhikkhū kukkuccāyantā na paṭiggaṇhanti.
analyzed: bhikkhū kukkuccāyantā na paṭiggaṇhanti

original: “Paṭiggaṇhatha, bhikkhave, paribhuñjatha.
analyzed: paṭiggaṇhatha bhikkhave paribhuñjatha

original: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, vanaṭṭhaṁ pokkharaṭṭhaṁ bhuttāvinā pavāritena anatirittaṁ paribhuñjitun”ti.
analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave vanaṭṭham pokkharaṭṭham bhuttāvinā pavāritena an atirittam paribhuñjitun ti

original: Tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyaṁ bahuṁ phalakhādanīyaṁ uppannaṁ hoti, kappiyakārako ca na hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyam bahum phala khādanīyam uppannam hoti kappiya kārako ca na hoti

original: Bhikkhū kukkuccāyantā phalaṁ na paribhuñjanti.
analyzed: bhikkhū kukkuccāyantā phalam na paribhuñjanti

original: Bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
analyzed: bhagavato etam attham ārocesu

original: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, abījaṁ nibbattabījaṁ akatakappaṁ phalaṁ paribhuñjitun”ti.
analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave abījam nibbatta bījam a kata kappam phalam paribhuñjitun ti

original: 8. Satthakammapaṭikkhepakathā
analyzed: sattha kamma paṭikkhepa kathā

original: Atha kho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ yathābhirantaṁ viharitvā yena rājagahaṁ tena cārikaṁ pakkāmi.
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavā sāvatthiyam yathābhirantam viharitvā yena rājagaham tena cārikam pakkāmi

original: Anupubbena cārikaṁ caramāno yena rājagahaṁ tadavasari.
analyzed: anupubbena cārikam caramānaḥ yena rājagaham tat avasari

original: Tatra sudaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
analyzed: tatra sudam bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe

original: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno bhagandalābādho hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno bhagandala ābādhaḥ hoti

original: Ākāsagotto vejjo satthakammaṁ karoti.
analyzed: ākāsa gottaḥ vejjaḥ sattha kammam karoti

original: Atha kho bhagavā senāsanacārikaṁ āhiṇḍanto yena tassa bhikkhuno vihāro tenupasaṅkami.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā senāsana cārikam āhiṇḍantaḥ yena tassa bhikkhuno vihāraḥ tena upasaṅkami

original: Addasā kho ākāsagotto vejjo bhagavantaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ, disvāna bhagavantaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: addasā kho ākāsa gottaḥ vejjaḥ bhagavantam dūratas vai āgacchanta disvāna bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “āgacchatu bhavaṁ gotamo, imassa bhikkhuno vaccamaggaṁ passatu, seyyathāpi godhāmukhan”ti.
analyzed: āgacchatu bhavam gotamaḥ imassa bhikkhuno vacca maggam passatu seyyathā api godhā mukham ti

original: Atha kho bhagavā—
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān

original: “so maṁ khvāyaṁ moghapuriso uppaṇḍetī”ti—
analyzed: saḥ mama khvā ayam mogha purisaḥ uppaṇḍeti iti

original: tatova paṭinivattitvā, etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātāpetvā, bhikkhū paṭipucchi—
analyzed: tatas va paṭinivattitvā etasmim nidāne etasmim pakaraṇe bhikkhu saṅgham sannipātāpetvā bhikkhū paṭipucchi

original: “atthi kira, bhikkhave, amukasmiṁ vihāre bhikkhu gilāno”ti?
analyzed: atthi kira bhikkhave amukasmin vihāre bhikkhu gilānaḥ ti

original: “Atthi, bhagavā”ti.
analyzed: atthi bhagavā ati

original: “Kiṁ tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ābādho”ti?
analyzed: kim tassa bhikkhave bhikkhuno ābādhaḥ ti

original: “Tassa, bhante, āyasmato bhagandalābādho, ākāsagotto vejjo satthakammaṁ karotī”ti.
analyzed: tassa bhante āyasmataḥ bhagandalābādhaḥ ākāsa gottaḥ vejjaḥ sattha kammam karoti iti

original: Vigarahi buddho bhagavā—
analyzed: vigarahi buddhaḥ bhagavān

original: “ananucchavikaṁ, bhikkhave, tassa moghapurisassa, ananulomikaṁ, appatirūpaṁ, assāmaṇakaṁ, akappiyaṁ, akaraṇīyaṁ.
analyzed: bhikkhave tassa moghapurisassa ananulomika appatirūpa a sāmaṇaka a kappiya a karaṇīya

original: Kathañhi nāma so, bhikkhave, moghapuriso sambādhe satthakammaṁ kārāpessati.
analyzed: katham hi nāma saḥ bhikkhave mogha purisaḥ sambādhe sattha kammam kārāpessati

original: Sambādhe, bhikkhave, sukhumā chavi, duropayo vaṇo, dupparihāraṁ satthaṁ.
analyzed: sambādhe bhikkhave sukhumā chavi vaṇaḥ dupparihāram

original: Netaṁ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṁ vā pasādāya …pe…
analyzed: na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: vigarahitvā …pe…
analyzed: vigara hitvā pe

original: dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
analyzed: dhammim katham katvā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “na, bhikkhave, sambādhe satthakammaṁ kārāpetabbaṁ.
analyzed: na bhikkhave sambādhe sattha kammam kārāpetabba

original: Yo kārāpeyya, āpatti thullaccayassā”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ kārāpeyye āpatti thullaccayassa ati

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū—
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū

original: “bhagavatā satthakammaṁ paṭikkhittan”ti—
analyzed: bhagavatā sattha kammam paṭikkhittanti

original: vatthikammaṁ kārāpenti.
analyzed: vatthi kammam kārāpenti

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā, te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū vatthikammaṁ kārāpessantī”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū vatthi kammam kārāpessanti iti

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ etam attham ārocesu

original: “Saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhū vatthikammaṁ kārāpentī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū vatthi kammam kārāpenti iti

original: “Saccaṁ, bhagavā”ti …pe…
analyzed: sat ca bhagavān ati pe

original: vigarahitvā dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
analyzed: vigarahitvā dhammim katham katvā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “na, bhikkhave, sambādhassa sāmantā dvaṅgulā satthakammaṁ vā vatthikammaṁ vā kārāpetabbaṁ.
analyzed: na bhikkhave sambādhassa sāmantā dvaṅgulā sattha kammam vā vatthi kammam vā kārāpetabba

original: Yo kārāpeyya, āpatti thullaccayassā”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ kārāpeyye āpatti thullaccayassa ati

original: 9. Manussamaṁsapaṭikkhepakathā
Atha kho bhagavā rājagahe yathābhirantaṁ viharitvā yena bārāṇasī tena cārikaṁ pakkāmi.
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavā rājagahe yathābhirantam viharitvā yena bārāṇasī tena cārikam pakkāmi

original: Anupubbena cārikaṁ caramāno yena bārāṇasī tadavasari.
analyzed: anupubbena cārikam caramānaḥ yena bārāṇasī tat avasari

original: Tatra sudaṁ bhagavā bārāṇasiyaṁ viharati isipatane migadāye.
analyzed: tatra sudam bhagavā bārāṇasiyam viharati isipatane migadāye

original: Tena kho pana samayena bārāṇasiyaṁ suppiyo ca upāsako suppiyā ca upāsikā ubhatopasannā honti, dāyakā, kārakā, saṅghupaṭṭhākā.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bārāṇasiyam suppiyaḥ ca upāsakaḥ suppiyā ca upāsikā ubhata upasannāḥ honti dāyakā kārakā saṅghupaṭṭhākā

original: Atha kho suppiyā upāsikā ārāmaṁ gantvā vihārena vihāraṁ pariveṇena pariveṇaṁ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhū pucchati—
analyzed: atha kho suppiyā upāsikā ārāmam gantvā vihārena vihāram pariveṇena pariveṇam upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhū pucchati

original: “ko, bhante, gilāno, kassa kiṁ āhariyatū”ti?
analyzed: kaḥ bhante gilānaḥ kassa kim āhariyatu uti

original: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarena bhikkhunā virecanaṁ pītaṁ hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aññatarena bhikkhunā virecanam pītam hoti

original: Atha kho so bhikkhu suppiyaṁ upāsikaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: atha kho saḥ bhikkhu suppiyam upāsikam etat avoca

original: “mayā kho, bhagini, virecanaṁ pītaṁ.
analyzed: mayā khalu bhagini virecanam pīta

original: Attho me paṭicchādanīyenā”ti.
analyzed: atthaḥ me paṭicchādanīyena ati

original: “Suṭṭhu, ayya, āhariyissatī”ti
analyzed: suṭṭhu ayyaḥ āhariyissati iti

original: gharaṁ gantvā antevāsiṁ āṇāpesi—
analyzed: gharam gantvā antevāsim āṇāpesi

original: “gaccha, bhaṇe, pavattamaṁsaṁ jānāhī”ti.
analyzed: gaccha bhaṇe pavattamasam jānāhi iti

original: “Evaṁ, ayye”ti kho so puriso suppiyāya upāsikāya paṭissuṇitvā kevalakappaṁ bārāṇasiṁ āhiṇḍanto na addasa pavattamaṁsaṁ.
analyzed: eva ayya iti kho saḥ purisaḥ suppiyāya upāsikāya paṭissuṇitvā kevalakappam bārāṇasim āhiṇḍantaḥ na addasa

original: Atha kho so puriso yena suppiyā upāsikā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā suppiyaṁ upāsikaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: atha kho saḥ purisaḥ yena suppiyā upāsikā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā suppiyam upāsikam etat avoca

original: “natthayye pavattamaṁsaṁ.
analyzed: natthayye pavattamasa

original: Māghāto ajjā”ti.
analyzed: māghātaḥ ajjāti

original: Atha kho suppiyāya upāsikāya etadahosi—
analyzed: atha kho suppiyāya upāsikāya etat ahosi

original: “tassa kho gilānassa bhikkhuno paṭicchādanīyaṁ alabhantassa ābādho vā abhivaḍḍhissati, kālaṅkiriyā vā bhavissati.
analyzed: tassa kho gilānassa bhikkhuno paṭicchādanīyam a labhantassa ābādhaḥ vā abhivaḍḍhissati kālaṅkiriyā vā bhavissati

original: Na kho metaṁ patirūpaṁ yāhaṁ paṭissuṇitvā na harāpeyyan”ti.
analyzed: na kho mā etam patirūpam yā aham paṭissuṇitvā na harāpeyyanti

original: Potthanikaṁ gahetvā ūrumaṁsaṁ ukkantitvā dāsiyā adāsi—
analyzed: potthanikam gahetvā ūru masam ukkantitvā dāsiyā adāsi

original: “handa, je, imaṁ maṁsaṁ sampādetvā amukasmiṁ vihāre bhikkhu gilāno, tassa dajjāhi.
analyzed: handa je imam masam sampādetvā amukasmin vihāre bhikkhu gilānaḥ tassa dajjāhi

original: Yo ca maṁ pucchati, ‘gilānā’ti paṭivedehī”ti uttarāsaṅgena ūruṁ veṭhetvā ovarakaṁ pavisitvā mañcake nipajji.
analyzed: yaḥ ca mama pucchati gilānā ati paṭivedehi iti uttarāsaṅgena ūrum veṭhetvā ovarakam pavisitvā mañcake nipajji

original: Atha kho suppiyo upāsako gharaṁ gantvā dāsiṁ pucchi—
analyzed: atha kho suppiyaḥ upāsakaḥ gharam gantvā dāsim pucchi

original: “kahaṁ suppiyā”ti?
analyzed: kaham

original: “Esāyya, ovarake nipannā”ti.
analyzed: esāyyaḥ ovarake nipannā ati

original: Atha kho suppiyo upāsako yena suppiyā upāsikā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā suppiyaṁ upāsikaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: atha kho suppiyaḥ upāsakaḥ yena suppiyā upāsikā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā suppiyam upāsikam etat avoca

original: “kissa nipannāsī”ti?
analyzed: kissa nipannā asi iti

original: “Gilānāmhī”ti.
analyzed: gilānā amhi iti

original: “Kiṁ te ābādho”ti?
analyzed: kim te ābādha uti

original: Atha kho suppiyā upāsikā suppiyassa upāsakassa etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
analyzed: atha kho suppiyā upāsikā suppiyassa upāsakassa etam attham ārocesi

original: Atha kho suppiyo upāsako—
analyzed: atha kho suppiyaḥ upāsakaḥ

original: “acchariyaṁ vata bho, abbhutaṁ vata bho.
analyzed: acchariyam vata bho abbhutam vata bho

original: Yāva saddhāyaṁ suppiyā pasannā, yatra hi nāma attanopi maṁsāni pariccattāni.
analyzed: yāva saddhā ayam su piyā pasannā yatra hi nāma masāni pariccattāni

original: Kimpimāya aññaṁ kiñci adeyyaṁ bhavissatī”ti—
analyzed: kimpimāya aññam kiñci adeyyam bhavissati iti

original: haṭṭho udaggo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: haṭṭhaḥ udaggaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho suppiyo upāsako bhagavantaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho suppiyaḥ upāsakaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “adhivāsetu me, bhante, bhagavā svātanāya bhattaṁ, saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghenā”ti.
analyzed: adhivāsetu me bhante bhagavā svātanāya bhatta saddhim bhikkhu saṅghena ati

original: Adhivāsesi bhagavā tuṇhībhāvena.
analyzed: adhivāsesi bhagavā tuṇhībhāvena

original: Atha kho suppiyo upāsako bhagavato adhivāsanaṁ viditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
analyzed: atha kho suppiyaḥ upāsakaḥ bhagavataḥ adhivāsanam viditvā uṭṭhāya āsanā bhagavantam abhivādetvā padakkhiṇam katvā pakkāmi

original: Atha kho suppiyo upāsako tassā rattiyā accayena paṇītaṁ khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ paṭiyādāpetvā bhagavato kālaṁ ārocāpesi—“kālo, bhante, niṭṭhitaṁ bhattan”ti.
analyzed: atha kho suppiyaḥ upāsakaḥ tassāḥ rattiyāḥ accayena paṇītam khādanīyam bhojanīyam paṭiyādāpetvā bhagavato kālam ārocāpesi kālaḥ bhante niṭṭhitam bhattanti

original: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena suppiyassa upāsakassa nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi, saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghena.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya yena suppiyassa upāsakassa nivesanam tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi saddhim bhikkhu saṅghena

original: Atha kho suppiyo upāsako yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi.
analyzed: atha kho suppiyaḥ upāsakaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam aṭṭhāsi

original: Ekamantaṁ ṭhitaṁ kho suppiyaṁ upāsakaṁ bhagavā etadavoca—“kahaṁ, suppiyā”ti?
analyzed: ekamantam ṭhitam kho suppiyam upāsakam bhagavān etat avocat kaha suppiya ati

original: “Gilānā, bhagavā”ti.
analyzed: gilānā bhagavā ati

original: “Tena hi āgacchatū”ti.
analyzed: tena hi āgacchatu uti

original: “Na, bhagavā, ussahatī”ti.
analyzed: na bhagavān ussahati iti

original: “Tena hi pariggahetvāpi ānethā”ti.
analyzed: tena hi pariggahetvā api ānetha ati

original: Atha kho suppiyo upāsako suppiyaṁ upāsikaṁ pariggahetvā ānesi.
analyzed: atha kho suppiyaḥ upāsakaḥ suppiyam upāsikam pariggahetvā ānesi

original: Tassā saha dassanena bhagavato tāva mahāvaṇo ruḷho ahosi succhavilomajāto.

original: Atha kho suppiyo ca upāsako suppiyā ca upāsikā—
analyzed: atha kho suppiyaḥ ca upāsakaḥ suppiyā ca upāsikā

original: “acchariyaṁ vata bho, abbhutaṁ vata bho.
analyzed: acchariyam vata bho abbhutam vata bho

original: Tathāgatassa mahiddhikatā mahānubhāvatā, yatra hi nāma saha dassanena bhagavato tāva mahāvaṇo ruḷho bhavissati succhavilomajāto”ti—
analyzed: tathāgatassa mahiddhika tā mahā anubhāva tā yatra hi nāma saha dassanena bhagavato tāva mahā vaṇaḥ ruḷhaḥ bhavissati succha viloma jātaḥ ti

original: haṭṭhā udaggā buddhappamukhaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappetvā sampavāretvā bhagavantaṁ bhuttāviṁ onītapattapāṇiṁ ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu.
analyzed: haṭṭhāḥ udaggāḥ buddha ppamukham bhikkhu saṅgham paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappetvā sampavāretvā bhagavantam bhuttāvim onīta patta pāṇim ekamantam nisīdisu

original: Atha kho bhagavā suppiyañca upāsakaṁ suppiyañca upāsikaṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṁsetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā suppiyam ca upāsakam suppiyam ca upāsikam dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahasetvā uṭṭhāya āsanā pakkāmi

original: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātāpetvā bhikkhū paṭipucchi—

original: Evaṁ vutte, so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca—“ahaṁ kho, bhante, suppiyaṁ upāsikaṁ maṁsaṁ viññāpesin”ti.

original: Na, bhikkhave, manussamaṁsaṁ paribhuñjitabbaṁ.

original: Tena kho pana samayena jānapadā manussā bahuṁ loṇampi, telampi, taṇḍulampi, khādanīyampi sakaṭesu āropetvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhā honti—

original: Atha kho bhagavā anupubbena cārikaṁ caramāno yena andhakavindaṁ tadavasari.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā anupubbena cārikam caramānaḥ yena andhakavindam tat avasari

original: Atha kho aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa paṭipāṭiṁ alabhantassa etadahosi—

original: “atītāni kho me dve māsāni buddhappamukhaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ anubandhantassa ‘yadā paṭipāṭiṁ

original: labhissāmi tadā bhattaṁ karissāmī’ti, na ca me paṭipāṭi labbhati, ahañcamhi ekattako,
analyzed: labhissāmi tadā bhattam karissāmi iti na ca me paṭipāṭi labbhati aham ca amhi ekattakaḥ

original: bahu ca me gharāvāsattho hāyati.
analyzed: bahu ca me gharā vāsatthaḥ hāyati

original: Yannūnāhaṁ bhattaggaṁ olokeyyaṁ;
analyzed: yat nūna aham bhattaggam olokeyya

original: yaṁ bhattagge nāssa, taṁ paṭiyādeyyan”ti.
analyzed: yam bhattagge na assa tam paṭiyādeyyanti

original: Atha kho so brāhmaṇo bhattaggaṁ olokento dve nāddasa—

original: yāguñca madhugoḷakañca.
analyzed: yāguñca madhu goḷakañca

original: Atha kho so brāhmaṇo yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: atha khalu saḥ brāhmaṇaḥ yena āyasmai ānandaḥ tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam ānandam etat avoca

original: “idha me, bho ānanda, paṭipāṭiṁ alabhantassa etadahosi—
analyzed: idha me bho ānanda paṭipāṭim a labhantassa etat ahosi

original: ‘atītāni kho me dve māsāni buddhappamukhaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ anubandhantassa, “yadā paṭipāṭiṁ labhissāmi tadā bhattaṁ karissāmī”ti.
analyzed: atītāni kho me dve māsāni buddha ppamukham bhikkhu saṅgham anubandhantassa yadā paṭipāṭim labhissāmi tadā bhattam karissāmi iti

original: Na ca me paṭipāṭi labbhati, ahañcamhi ekattako, bahu ca me gharāvāsattho hāyati.
analyzed: na ca me paṭipāṭi labbhati aham ca asmi ekattakaḥ bahu ca me ghara āvāsatthaḥ hāyati

original: Yannūnāhaṁ bhattaggaṁ olokeyyaṁ;
analyzed: yat nūna aham bhattaggam olokeyya

original: yaṁ bhattagge nāssa, taṁ paṭiyādeyyan’ti.
analyzed: yam bhattagge na assa tam paṭiyādeyyanti

original: So kho ahaṁ, bho ānanda, bhattaggaṁ olokento dve nāddasaṁ—
analyzed: saḥ kho aha bho ānanda bhattaggam olokentaḥ dve na āddasa

original: yāguñca madhugoḷakañca.
analyzed: yāguñca madhu goḷakañca

original: Sacāhaṁ, bho ānanda, paṭiyādeyyaṁ yāguñca madhugoḷakañca, paṭiggaṇheyya me bhavaṁ gotamo”ti?

original: “Tena hi, brāhmaṇa, bhagavantaṁ paṭipucchissāmī”ti.

original: Atha kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesi.

original: “Tena hānanda, paṭiyādetū”ti.
analyzed: tena ha ānanda paṭiyādetu uti

original: “Tena hi, brāhmaṇa, paṭiyādehī”ti.
analyzed: tena hi brāhmaṇa paṭiyādehi iti

original: Atha kho so brāhmaṇo tassā rattiyā accayena pahūtaṁ yāguñca madhugoḷakañca paṭiyādāpetvā bhagavato upanāmesi—
analyzed: atha kho saḥ brāhmaṇaḥ tassā rattiyāḥ accayena pahūtam yāguñca madhu goḷakañca paṭiyādāpetvā bhagavataḥ upanāmesi

original: “paṭiggaṇhātu me bhavaṁ gotamo yāguñca madhugoḷakañcā”ti.

original: “Tena hi, brāhmaṇa, bhikkhūnaṁ dehī”ti.
analyzed: tena hi brāhmaṇa bhikkhūnam dehi iti

original: Bhikkhū kukkuccāyantā na paṭiggaṇhanti.
analyzed: bhikkhū kukkuccāyantā na paṭiggaṇhanti

original: “Paṭiggaṇhatha, bhikkhave, paribhuñjathā”ti.
analyzed: paṭiggaṇhatha bhikkhave paribhuñjatha ati

original: Atha kho so brāhmaṇo buddhappamukhaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ pahūtāya yāguyā ca madhugoḷakena ca sahatthā santappetvā sampavāretvā bhagavantaṁ dhotahatthaṁ onītapattapāṇiṁ ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ brāhmaṇaḥ buddha ppamukham bhikkhu saṅgham pahūtāya yāguyā ca madhu goḷakena ca sahatthā santappetvā sampavāretvā bhagavantam dhotahattham onīta patta pāṇim ekamantam nisīdi

analyzed: kathā āha bhante paṭipajjāmi iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho belaṭṭho kaccāno bhagavato paṭissuṇitvā bhikkhūnaṁ guḷaṁ yāvadatthaṁ datvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho belaṭṭhaḥ kaccānaḥ bhagavataḥ paṭissuṇitvā bhikkhūnam guḷam yāvadattham datvā bhagavantam etat avoca

original: Yasmiṁ padese majjhimā devatā vatthūni pariggaṇhanti, majjhimānaṁ tattha rājūnaṁ rājamahāmattānaṁ cittāni namanti nivesanāni māpetuṁ.

original: Yasmiṁ padese nīcā devatā vatthūni pariggaṇhanti, nīcānaṁ tattha rājūnaṁ rājamahāmattānaṁ cittāni namanti nivesanāni māpetuṁ.

original: Adhivāsesi bhagavā tuṇhībhāvena.

original: 18. Licchavīvatthu
analyzed: licchavīvatthu

original: Assosuṁ kho vesālikā licchavī—
analyzed: kho vesālikā licchavī

analyzed: bhagavā kira koṭigāmam an uppatto ti

analyzed: atha kho vesālikā licchavī bhadrāni bhadrāni yānāni yojāpetvā bhadram bhadram yānam abhiruhitvā bhadrehi bhadrehi yānehi vesāliyāḥ niyyāsum bhagavantam dassanāya

analyzed: pītāḥ honti pīta vaṇṇā pīta vatthā pīta alaṅkārāḥ appekacce licchavī lohitāḥ honti lohita vaṇṇā

analyzed: lohitavatthāḥ lohita alaṅkārāḥ appekacce licchavī odātāḥ honti odāta vaṇṇāḥ odāta vatthāḥ odāta alaṅkārā

original: Atha kho ambapālī gaṇikā daharānaṁ daharānaṁ licchavīnaṁ īsāya īsaṁ yugena yugaṁ cakkena cakkaṁ akkhena akkhaṁ paṭivaṭṭesi.
analyzed: atha kho ambapālī gaṇikā daharānam daharānam licchavīnam īsāya īsam yugena yugam cakkena cakkam akkhena akkham paṭivaṭṭesi

original: Atha kho te licchavī ambapāliṁ gaṇikaṁ etadavocuṁ—
analyzed: atha khalu te licchavī ambapālim gaṇikam etat avocuḥ

original: “kissa, je ambapāli, daharānaṁ daharānaṁ licchavīnaṁ īsāya īsaṁ yugena yugaṁ cakkena cakkaṁ akkhena akkhaṁ paṭivaṭṭesī”ti?
analyzed: kissa je ambapāli daharānam daharānam licchavīnam īsāya īsam yugena yugam cakkena cakkam akkhena akkham paṭivaṭṭesi iti

original: “Tathā hi pana mayā, ayyaputtā, svātanāya buddhappamukho bhikkhusaṅgho nimantito”ti.
analyzed: tathā hi pana mayā ayya puttā svātanāya buddha ppamukhaḥ bhikkhu saṅghaḥ nimantito ti

original: “Dehi, je ambapāli, amhākaṁ etaṁ bhattaṁ satasahassenā”ti.
analyzed: dehi je ambapāli amhākam etam bhattam sata sahassena ati

original: “Sacepi me, ayyaputtā, vesāliṁ sāhāraṁ dajjeyyātha, neva dajjāhaṁ taṁ bhattan”ti.
analyzed: sace ipi me ayya puttāḥ vesālim sa āhāram dajjeyyātha na iva dajja aham tam

original: Atha kho te licchavī aṅguliṁ phoṭesuṁ—
analyzed: atha kho te licchavī aṅgulim phoṭesu

original: “jitamha vata bho ambakāya, parājitamha vata bho ambakāyā”ti.
analyzed: vata bho ambakāya parājitamha vata bho ambakāya ati

original: Atha kho te licchavī yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu.
analyzed: atha khalu te licchavī yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkamisu

original: Addasā kho bhagavā te licchavī dūratova āgacchante, disvāna bhikkhū āmantesi—
analyzed: addasā kho bhagavā te licchavī dūratas vā āgacchante disvāna bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “yehi, bhikkhave, bhikkhūhi devā tāvatiṁsā adiṭṭhapubbā, oloketha, bhikkhave, licchavīparisaṁ;
analyzed: yehi bhikkhave bhikkhūhi devā tāvatisāḥ a diṭṭha pubbāḥ oloketha bhikkhave licchavīparisa

original: apaloketha, bhikkhave, licchavīparisaṁ;
analyzed: bhikkhave licchavīparisa

original: upasaṁharatha, bhikkhave, licchavīparisaṁ tāvatiṁsaparisan”ti.
analyzed: upasaharatha bhikkhave licchavī parisam tāvati sa parisanti

original: Atha kho te licchavī yāvatikā yānassa bhūmi, yānena gantvā yānā paccorohitvā pattikāva yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
analyzed: atha kho te licchavī yāvatikā yānassa bhūmi yānena gantvā yānā paccorohitvā pattikā ava yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkamisu

original: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu.
analyzed: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinne kho te licchavī bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi.
analyzed: ekamantam nisinne kho te licchavī bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahasesi

original: Atha kho te licchavī, bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassitā samādapitā samuttejitā sampahaṁsitā bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ—
analyzed: atha kho te licchavī bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassitā samādapitā samuttejitā sampahasitā bhagavantam etat avocuḥ

original: “adhivāsetu no, bhante, bhagavā svātanāya bhattaṁ saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghenā”ti.
analyzed: adhivāsetu naḥ bhante bhagavā svātanāya bhattam saddhim bhikkhu saṅghena ati

original: “Adhivuṭṭhomhi, licchavī, svātanāya ambapāliyā gaṇikāya bhattan”ti.
analyzed: adhivuṭṭhaḥ umhi licchavī svātanāya ambapāliyā gaṇikāya

original: Atha kho te licchavī aṅguliṁ phoṭesuṁ—
analyzed: atha kho te licchavī aṅgulim phoṭesu

original: “jitamha vata bho ambakāya, parājitamha vata bho ambakāyā”ti.
analyzed: vata bho ambakāya parājitamha vata bho ambakāya ati

original: Atha kho te licchavī bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkamiṁsu.
analyzed: atha kho te licchavī bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāya āsanā bhagavantam abhivādetvā padakkhiṇam katvā pakkamisu

analyzed: atha khalu bhagavā koṭigāme yathābhirantam viharitvā yena nātikā tena upasaṅkami

original: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena ambapāliyā gaṇikāya parivesanā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghena.

original: Atha kho ambapālī gaṇikā buddhappamukhaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena

analyzed: sahatthā santappetvā sampavāretvā bhagavantam bhuttāvim onīta patta pāṇim ekamanta

original: Paṭiggahesi bhagavā ārāmaṁ.
analyzed: paṭiggahesi bhagavā ārāma

analyzed: atha kho bhagavā ambapālim gaṇikam dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahasetvā uṭṭhāya āsanā yena mahā vanam tena upasaṅkami

analyzed: tatra sudam bhagavā vesāliyam viharati mahā vane kūṭāgāra sālāya

analyzed: nissasayam kho so bhagavā araham sammāsambuddhaḥ bhavissati tathā hime abhiññātā

analyzed: sutam me bhante akiriya vādaḥ samaṇaḥ gotamaḥ akiriyāya dhammam deseti tena ca sāvake vineti iti

original: “Anuviccakāraṁ kho, sīha, karohi; anuviccakāro tumhādisānaṁ ñātamanussānaṁ sādhu hotī”ti.

original: “Imināpāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavato bhiyyoso mattāya attamano abhiraddho, yaṁ maṁ bhagavā evamāha—

original: ‘anuviccakāraṁ kho, sīha, karohi; anuviccakāro tumhādisānaṁ ñātamanussānaṁ sādhu hotī’ti.
analyzed: anuviccakāram kho sīha karohi anuviccakāro tumhādisānam ñāta manussānam sādhu hoti iti

original: Mamañhi, bhante, aññatitthiyā sāvakaṁ labhitvā kevalakappaṁ vesāliṁ paṭākaṁ parihareyyuṁ—‘sīho kho amhākaṁ senāpati sāvakattaṁ upagato’ti.
analyzed: maman hi bhante añña titthiyāḥ sāvakam labhitvā kevala kappam vesālim paṭākam parihareyyu sīhaḥ kho amhākam senāpati sāvaka ttam upagataḥ ti

original: Atha ca pana maṁ bhagavā evamāha—

original: ‘anuviccakāraṁ kho, sīha, karohi; anuviccakāro tumhādisānaṁ ñātamanussānaṁ sādhu hotī’ti.

original: Esāhaṁ, bhante, dutiyampi bhagavantaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.

original: Upāsakaṁ maṁ bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.

analyzed: dīgharattam kho te sīha nigaṇṭhānam opāna bhūtam kula yena na īsam upagatānam piṇḍakam dātabbam maññeyyāsi iti

original: “Imināpāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavato bhiyyoso mattāya attamano abhiraddho, yaṁ maṁ bhagavā evamāha—

original: ‘dīgharattaṁ kho te, sīha, nigaṇṭhānaṁ opānabhūtaṁ kulaṁ, yena nesaṁ upagatānaṁ piṇḍakaṁ dātabbaṁ maññeyyāsī’ti.
analyzed: dīgharattam kho te sīha nigaṇṭhānam opāna bhūtam kula yena na īsam upagatānam piṇḍakam dātabbam maññeyyāsi iti

original: Sutaṁ me taṁ, bhante, samaṇo gotamo evamāha—

analyzed: mayham eva dinnam mahapphala na aññesam dinnam mahapphala mayham eva sāvakānam dinnam mahapphala na aññesam sāvakānam dinnam mahapphalanti

analyzed: esā aha bhante tatiyam pi bhagavantam saraṇam gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhu saṅghañca

original: Upāsakaṁ maṁ bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.
analyzed: upāsakam mam bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇa upetam saraṇam gatanti

original: Atha kho bhagavā sīhassa senāpatissa anupubbiṁ kathaṁ kathesi, seyyathidaṁ—

original: dānakathaṁ …pe…

original: aparappaccayo satthusāsane bhagavantaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: apara ppaccayaḥ satthu sāsane bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “adhivāsetu me, bhante, bhagavā svātanāya bhattaṁ saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghenā”ti.
analyzed: adhivāsetu me bhante bhagavā svātanāya bhattam saddhim bhikkhu saṅghena ati

original: Adhivāsesi bhagavā tuṇhībhāvena.
analyzed: adhivāsesi bhagavā tuṇhībhāvena

original: Atha kho sīho senāpati bhagavato adhivāsanaṁ viditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
analyzed: atha kho sīhaḥ senāpatiḥ bhagavataḥ adhivāsanam viditvā uṭṭhāya āsanā bhagavantam abhivādetvā padakkhiṇam katvā pakkāmi

original: Atha kho sīho senāpati aññataraṁ purisaṁ āṇāpesi—
analyzed: atha kho sīhaḥ senāpati aññataram purisam āṇāpesi

original: “gaccha, bhaṇe, pavattamaṁsaṁ jānāhī”ti.
analyzed: gaccha bhaṇe pavattamasam jānāhi iti

original: Atha kho sīho senāpati tassā rattiyā accayena paṇītaṁ khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ paṭiyādāpetvā bhagavato kālaṁ ārocāpesi—“kālo, bhante, niṭṭhitaṁ bhattan”ti.
analyzed: atha kho sīhaḥ senāpati tassāḥ rattiyāḥ accayena paṇītam khādanīyam bhojanīyam paṭiyādāpetvā bhagavato kālam ārocāpesi kālaḥ bhante niṭṭhitam bhattanti

original: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena sīhassa senāpatissa nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghena.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya yena sīhassa senāpatissa nivesanam tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi saddhim bhikkhu saṅghena

original: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā nigaṇṭhā vesāliyaṁ rathikāya rathikaṁ siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakaṁ bāhā paggayha kandanti—
analyzed: tena khalu pana samayena sambahulāḥ nigaṇṭhāḥ vesāliyam rathikāya rathikam siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakam bāhā paggayha kandanti

original: “ajja sīhena senāpatinā thūlaṁ pasuṁ vadhitvā samaṇassa gotamassa bhattaṁ kataṁ, taṁ samaṇo gotamo jānaṁ uddissakataṁ maṁsaṁ paribhuñjati paṭiccakamman”ti.
analyzed: ajja sīhena senāpatinā thūlam pasum vadhitvā samaṇassa gotamassa bhattam kata tam samaṇaḥ gotamaḥ jānam uddissa katam masam paribhuñjati paṭiccakammanti

original: Atha kho aññataro puriso yena sīho senāpati tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā sīhassa senāpatissa upakaṇṇake ārocesi—
analyzed: atha kho aññataraḥ purisaḥ yena sīhaḥ senāpati tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā sīhassa senāpatissa upakaṇṇake ārocesi

original: “yagghe, bhante, jāneyyāsi, ete sambahulā nigaṇṭhā vesāliyaṁ rathikāya rathikaṁ siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakaṁ bāhā paggayha kandanti—
analyzed: yat he bhante jāneyyāsi ete sambahulāḥ nigaṇṭhāḥ vesāliyam rathikāya rathikam siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakam bāhā paggayha kandanti

original: ‘ajja sīhena senāpatinā thūlaṁ pasuṁ vadhitvā samaṇassa gotamassa bhattaṁ kataṁ, taṁ samaṇo gotamo jānaṁ uddissakataṁ maṁsaṁ paribhuñjati paṭiccakamman’”ti.
analyzed: ajja sīhena senāpatinā thūlam pasum vadhitvā samaṇassa gotamassa bhattam kata tam samaṇaḥ gotamaḥ jānam uddissa katam masam paribhuñjati paṭiccakammanti

original: “Alaṁ, ayyo, dīgharattampi te āyasmantā avaṇṇakāmā buddhassa, avaṇṇakāmā dhammassa, avaṇṇakāmā saṅghassa;
analyzed: ala ayyaḥ dīgharattam pi te āyasmantā avaṇṇa kāmāḥ buddhassa avaṇṇa kāmāḥ dhammassa avaṇṇa kāmā saṅghassa

original: na ca pana te āyasmantā jiridanti taṁ bhagavantaṁ asatā tucchā musā abhūtena abbhācikkhantā;
analyzed: na ca pana te āyasmantā jiridanti tam bhagavantam asatā tucchā musā abhūtena abbhācikkhantā

original: na ca mayaṁ jīvitahetupi sañcicca pāṇaṁ jīvitā voropeyyāmā”ti.
analyzed: na ca mayam sañcit ca pāṇam jīvitā voropeyyāma ati

original: Atha kho sīho senāpati buddhappamukhaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappetvā sampavāretvā bhagavantaṁ bhuttāviṁ onītapattapāṇiṁ ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: atha kho sīhaḥ senāpati buddha ppamukham bhikkhu saṅgham paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappetvā sampavāretvā bhagavantam bhuttāvim onīta patta pāṇim ekamantam nisīdi

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho sīhaṁ senāpatiṁ bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṁsetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnam kho sīham senāpatim bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahasetvā uṭṭhāya āsanā pakkāmi

original: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etasmim nidāne etasmim pakaraṇe dhammim katham katvā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “na, bhikkhave, jānaṁ uddissakataṁ maṁsaṁ paribhuñjitabbaṁ.
analyzed: na bhikkhave jānam uddissa katam masam

original: Yo paribhuñjeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yaḥ paribhuñjeyya āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tikoṭiparisuddhaṁ macchamaṁsaṁ—adiṭṭhaṁ assutaṁ aparisaṅkitan”ti.
analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave ti koṭi parisuddham mat chamasa adiṭṭham a sutam a parisaṅkitam ti

original: 20. Kappiyabhūmianujānana
Tena kho pana samayena vesālī subhikkhā hoti susassā sulabhapiṇḍā, sukarā uñchena paggahena yāpetuṁ.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena vesālī subhikkhā hoti su sassā sulabha piṇḍā sukarā uñchena paggahena yāpetu

original: Atha kho bhagavato rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi—
analyzed: atha kho bhagavataḥ rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evam cetasaḥ parivitakkaḥ udapādi

original: “yāni tāni mayā bhikkhūnaṁ anuññātāni dubbhikkhe dussasse dullabhapiṇḍe anto vuṭṭhaṁ
analyzed: yāni tāni mayā bhikkhūnam anuññātāni dubbhikkhe dussasse dullabha piṇḍe antar vuṭṭha

original: anto pakkaṁ sāmaṁ pakkaṁ uggahitapaṭiggahitakaṁ tato nīhaṭaṁ purebhattaṁ paṭiggahitaṁ
analyzed: antar pakkam sāmam pakkam uggahita paṭiggahitakam tatas nīhaṭam purebhattam paṭiggahita

original: vanaṭṭhaṁ pokkharaṭṭhaṁ, ajjāpi nu kho tāni bhikkhū paribhuñjantī”ti.
analyzed: vanaṭṭham pokkharaṭṭha ajja api nu kho tāni bhikkhū paribhuñjanti iti

original: Atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi—
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā sāyanha samayam paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitaḥ āyasmantam ānandam āmantesi

original: “yāni tāni, ānanda, mayā bhikkhūnaṁ anuññātāni dubbhikkhe dussasse dullabhapiṇḍe
analyzed: yāni tāni ānanda mayā bhikkhūnam anuññātāni dubbhikkhe dussasse dullabha piṇḍe

original: anto vuṭṭhaṁ anto pakkaṁ sāmaṁ pakkaṁ uggahitapaṭiggahitakaṁ tato nīhaṭaṁ purebhattaṁ
analyzed: antar vuṭṭham antar pakkam sāmam pakkam uggahita paṭiggahitakam tatas nīhaṭam purebhatta

original: paṭiggahitaṁ vanaṭṭhaṁ pokkharaṭṭhaṁ, ajjāpi nu kho tāni bhikkhū paribhuñjantī”ti?
analyzed: paṭiggahitam vanaṭṭham pokkharaṭṭha ajja api nu kho tāni bhikkhū paribhuñjanti iti

original: “Paribhuñjanti, bhagavā”ti.
analyzed: paribhuñjanti bhagavā ati

original: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etasmim nidāne etasmim pakaraṇe dhammim katham katvā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “yāni tāni, bhikkhave, mayā bhikkhūnaṁ anuññātāni dubbhikkhe dussasse dullabhapiṇḍe
analyzed: yāni tāni bhikkhave mayā bhikkhūnam anuññātāni dubbhikkhe dussasse dullabha piṇḍe

original: anto vuṭṭhaṁ anto pakkaṁ sāmaṁ pakkaṁ uggahitapaṭiggahitakaṁ tato nīhaṭaṁ purebhattaṁ
analyzed: antar vuṭṭham antar pakkam sāmam pakkam uggahita paṭiggahitakam tatas nīhaṭam purebhatta

original: paṭiggahitaṁ vanaṭṭhaṁ pokkharaṭṭhaṁ, tānāhaṁ ajjatagge paṭikkhipāmi.
analyzed: paṭiggahitam vanaṭṭham pokkharaṭṭha tāna aham ajja tagge paṭikkhipāmi

original: Na, bhikkhave, anto vuṭṭhaṁ anto pakkaṁ sāmaṁ pakkaṁ uggahitapaṭiggahitakaṁ paribhuñjitabbaṁ.
analyzed: na bhikkhave antar vuṭṭham antar pakkam sāmam pakkam uggahita paṭiggahitakam

original: Yo paribhuñjeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yaḥ paribhuñjeyya āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Na ca, bhikkhave, tato nīhaṭaṁ purebhattaṁ paṭiggahitaṁ vanaṭṭhaṁ pokkharaṭṭhaṁ bhuttāvinā pavāritena anatirittaṁ paribhuñjitabbaṁ.
analyzed: na ca bhikkhave tatas nīhaṭam purebhattam paṭiggahitam vanaṭṭham pokkharaṭṭham bhuttāvinā pavāritena anatirittam paribhuñjitabba

original: Yo paribhuñjeyya, yathādhammo kāretabbo”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ paribhuñjeyya yathādhammo kāretabbo ti

original: Tena kho pana samayena jānapadā manussā bahuṁ loṇampi, telampi, taṇḍulampi, khādanīyampi
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena jānapadāḥ manussāḥ bahum loṇam pi telam pi taṇḍulam pi khādanīyam pi

original: sakaṭesu āropetvā bahārāmakoṭṭhake sakaṭaparivaṭṭaṁ karitvā acchanti—“yadā paṭipāṭiṁ
analyzed: sakaṭesu āropetvā baha ārāma koṭṭhake sakaṭa parivaṭṭam karitvā acchantiyadā paṭipāṭi

original: labhissāma, tadā bhattaṁ karissāmā”ti.
analyzed: labhissāma tadā bhattam karissāma ati

original: Mahā ca megho uggato hoti.
analyzed: mahā ca meghaḥ uggataḥ hoti

original: Atha kho te manussā yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkamiṁsu, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ
analyzed: atha kho te manussāḥ yena āyasmantaḥ ānandaḥ tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam ānanda

original: etadavocuṁ—“idha, bhante ānanda, bahuṁ loṇampi, telampi, taṇḍulampi, khādanīyampi
analyzed: etat avocuḥ idha bhante ānanda bahum loṇam pi telam pi taṇḍulam pi khādanīyam pi

original: sakaṭesu āropitā tiṭṭhanti, mahā ca megho uggato; kathaṁ nu kho, bhante ānanda, paṭipajjitabban”ti?
analyzed: sakaṭesu āropitā tiṭṭhanti mahā ca meghaḥ uggataḥ katham nu kho bhante ānanda paṭipajjitabbanti

original: Atha kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmai ānandaḥ bhagavataḥ etam attham ārocesi

original: “Tena hānanda, saṅgho paccantimaṁ vihāraṁ kappiyabhūmiṁ sammannitvā tattha vāsetu, yaṁ saṅgho ākaṅkhati vihāraṁ vā aḍḍhayogaṁ vā pāsādaṁ vā hammiyaṁ vā guhaṁ vā.
analyzed: tena ha ānanda saṅghaḥ paccantimam vihāram kappiya bhūmim sammannitvā tattha vāsetu yam saṅghaḥ ākaṅkhati vihāram vā aḍḍhayogam vā pāsādam vā hammiyam vā guham vā

original: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, sammannitabbā.
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave sammannitabbā

original: Byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo—
analyzed: byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅghaḥ ñāpetabbaḥ

original: ‘Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho.
analyzed: suṇātu me bhante saṅghaḥ

original: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho itthannāmaṁ vihāraṁ kappiyabhūmiṁ sammanneyya.
analyzed: yadi saṅghassa pattakalla saṅghaḥ itthannāmam vihāram kappiya bhūmim sammanneyya

original: Esā ñatti.
analyzed: esā ñatti

original: Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho.
analyzed: suṇātu me bhante saṅghaḥ

original: Saṅgho itthannāmaṁ vihāraṁ kappiyabhūmiṁ sammannati.
analyzed: saṅghaḥ itthannāmam vihāram kappiya bhūmim sammannati

original: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa vihārassa kappiyabhūmiyā sammuti, so tuṇhassa;
analyzed: yassa ayasmataḥ khamati itthannāmassa vihārassa kappiya bhūmiyā sammuti saḥ tuṇhassa

original: yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyya.
analyzed: yassa na khamati saḥ bhāseyya

original: Sammato saṅghena itthannāmo vihāro kappiyabhūmi.
analyzed: sammataḥ saṅghena itthannāmaḥ vihāro kappiya bhūmi

original: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
analyzed: khamati saṅghassa tasmai tuṇhī evam etam dhārayāmi iti

original: Tena kho pana samayena manussā tattheva sammutiyā kappiyabhūmiyā yāguyo pacanti, bhattāni pacanti, sūpāni sampādenti, maṁsāni koṭṭenti, kaṭṭhāni phālenti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena manussā tattha iva sammutiyā kappiya bhūmiyā yāguyaḥ pacanti bhattāni pacanti sūpāni sampādenti masāni koṭṭenti kaṭṭhāni phālenti

original: Assosi kho bhagavā rattiyā paccūsasamayaṁ paccuṭṭhāya uccāsaddaṁ mahāsaddaṁ kākoravasaddaṁ, sutvāna āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi—
analyzed: assosi kho bhagavā rattiyā paccūsa samayam paccuṭṭhāya uccāsaddam mahāsaddam kākoravasadda sutvāna āyasmantam ānandam āmantesi

original: “kiṁ nu kho so, ānanda, uccāsaddo mahāsaddo kākoravasaddo”ti?
analyzed: kim nu kho saḥ ānanda uccā saddaḥ mahā saddaḥ kākorava saddaḥ iti

original: “Etarahi, bhante, manussā tattheva sammutiyā kappiyabhūmiyā yāguyo pacanti, bhattāni pacanti, sūpāni sampādenti, maṁsāni koṭṭenti, kaṭṭhāni phālenti.
analyzed: etarahi bhante manussā tattha iva sammutiyā kappiya bhūmiyā yāguyo pacanti bhattāni pacanti sūpāni sampādenti masāni koṭṭenti kaṭṭhāni phālenti

original: So eso, bhagavā, uccāsaddo mahāsaddo kākoravasaddo”ti.
analyzed: saḥ esaḥ bhagavā uccā saddaḥ mahā saddaḥ kākorava saddaḥ iti

original: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etasmim nidāne etasmim pakaraṇe dhammim katham katvā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “na, bhikkhave, sammuti kappiyabhūmi paribhuñjitabbā.
analyzed: na bhikkhave sammuti kappiya bhūmi paribhuñjitabbā

original: Yo paribhuñjeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yaḥ paribhuñjeyya āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tisso kappiyabhūmiyo—
analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave tissaḥ kappiya bhūmiyaḥ

original: ussāvanantikaṁ gonisādikaṁ gahapatin”ti.
analyzed: ussāvana ntikam gonisādikam gahapatinti

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā yasojo gilāno hoti.
analyzed: tena khalu pana samayena āyasmā yasojaḥ gilānaḥ hoti

original: Tassatthāya bhesajjāni āhariyanti.
analyzed: tassa atthāya bhesajjāni āhariyanti

original: Tāni bhikkhū bahi vāsenti.
analyzed: tāni bhikkhū bahi vāsenti

original: Ukkapiṇḍakāpi khādanti, corāpi haranti.
analyzed: khādanti corāḥ api haranti

original: Bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
analyzed: bhagavato etam attham ārocesu

original: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sammutiṁ kappiyabhūmiṁ paribhuñjituṁ.
analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave sammutim kappiya bhūmim paribhuñjitu

original: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, catasso kappiyabhūmiyo—
analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave catasso kappiya bhūmiyaḥ

original: ussāvanantikaṁ gonisādikaṁ gahapatiṁ sammutin”ti.
analyzed: ussāvana ntikam gonisādikam gahapatim

original: Sīhabhāṇavāro niṭṭhito catuttho.
analyzed: sīhabhāṇa vāro niṭṭhito catuttho

original: 21. Meṇḍakagahapativatthu
analyzed: meṇḍaka gahapati vatthu

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhaddiyanagare meṇḍako gahapati paṭivasati.

original: Tassa evarūpo iddhānubhāvo hoti—
analyzed: tassa evarūpaḥ iddha anubhāvaḥ hoti

original: sīsaṁ nahāyitvā dhaññāgāraṁ sammajjāpetvā bahidvāre nisīdati, antalikkhā dhaññassa dhārā opatitvā dhaññāgāraṁ pūreti.
analyzed: sīsam nahāyitvā dhaññāgāram sammajjāpetvā bahidvāre nisīdati antalikkhā dhaññassa dhārā opatitvā dhaññāgāram pūreti

original: Bhariyāya evarūpo iddhānubhāvo hoti—
analyzed: evarūpaḥ iddha anubhāvaḥ

original: ekaṁyeva āḷhakathālikaṁ upanisīditvā ekañca sūpabhiñjanakaṁ dāsakammakaraporisaṁ bhattena parivisati, na tāva taṁ khiyyati yāva sā na vuṭṭhāti.
analyzed: ekayā iva āḷhaka thālikam upanisīditvā ekañca su upabhiñjanakam dāsa kammakara porisam bhattena parivisati na tāva tam khiyyati yāva sā na vuṭṭhāti

original: Puttassa evarūpo iddhānubhāvo hoti—
analyzed: puttassa evarūpaḥ iddha anubhāvaḥ hoti

original: ekaṁyeva sahassathavikaṁ gahetvā dāsakammakaraporisassa chamāsikaṁ vetanaṁ deti, na tāva taṁ khiyyati yāvassa hatthagatā.
analyzed: ekayā iva sahassa thavikam gahetvā dāsa kammakara porisassa cha māsikam vetanam deti na tāva tam khiyyati yāva assa hattha gatā

original: Suṇisāya evarūpo iddhānubhāvo hoti—
analyzed: evarūpaḥ iddha anubhāvaḥ hoti

original: ekaṁyeva catudoṇikaṁ piṭakaṁ upanisīditvā dāsakammakaraporisassa chamāsikaṁ bhattaṁ deti, na tāva taṁ khiyyati yāva sā na vuṭṭhāti.
analyzed: ekayā iva catudoṇikam piṭakam upanisīditvā dāsa kammakara porisassa cha māsikam bhattam deti na tāva tam khiyyati yāva sā na vuṭṭhāti

original: Dāsassa evarūpo iddhānubhāvo hoti—
analyzed: dāsassa evarūpaḥ iddha anubhāvaḥ hoti

original: ekena naṅgalena kasantassa satta sītāyo gacchanti.
analyzed: ekena naṅgalena kasantassa satta sītāyaḥ gacchanti

original: Assosi kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro—
analyzed: assosi kho rājā māgadhaḥ seniyaḥ bimbisāraḥ

original: Tassa evarūpo iddhānubhāvo—
analyzed: tassa evarūpaḥ iddha anubhāvaḥ

original: sīsaṁ nahāyitvā dhaññāgāraṁ sammajjāpetvā bahidvāre nisīdati, antalikkhā dhaññassa dhārā opatitvā dhaññāgāraṁ pūreti.
analyzed: sīsam nahāyitvā dhaññāgāram sammajjāpetvā bahidvāre nisīdati antalikkhā dhaññassa dhārā opatitvā dhaññāgāram pūreti

original: Bhariyāya evarūpo iddhānubhāvo—
analyzed: bhariyāya evarūpaḥ iddha anubhāvaḥ

original: ekaṁyeva āḷhakathālikaṁ upanisīditvā ekañca sūpabhiñjanakaṁ dāsakammakaraporisaṁ bhattena parivisati, na tāva taṁ khiyyati yāva sā na vuṭṭhāti.
analyzed: ekayā iva āḷhaka thālikam upanisīditvā ekañca su upabhiñjanakam dāsa kammakara porisam bhattena parivisati na tāva tam khiyyati yāva sā na vuṭṭhāti

original: Puttassa evarūpo iddhānubhāvo—
analyzed: puttassa evarūpaḥ iddha anubhāvaḥ

original: ekaṁyeva sahassathavikaṁ gahetvā dāsakammakaraporisassa chamāsikaṁ vetanaṁ deti, na tāva taṁ khiyyati yāvassa hatthagatā.
analyzed: ekayā iva sahassa thavikam gahetvā dāsa kammakara porisassa cha māsikam vetanam deti na tāva tam khiyyati yāva assa hattha gatā

original: Suṇisāya evarūpo iddhānubhāvo—
analyzed: evarūpaḥ iddha anubhāvaḥ

original: ekaṁyeva catudoṇikaṁ piṭakaṁ upanisīditvā dāsakammakaraporisassa chamāsikaṁ bhattaṁ deti, na tāva taṁ khiyyati yāva sā na vuṭṭhāti.
analyzed: ekayā iva catudoṇikam piṭakam upanisīditvā dāsa kammakara porisassa cha māsikam bhattam deti na tāva tam khiyyati yāva sā na vuṭṭhāti

original: Dāsassa evarūpo iddhānubhāvo—
analyzed: dāsassa evarūpaḥ iddha anubhāvaḥ

original: ekena naṅgalena kasantassa satta sītāyo gacchantī”ti.
analyzed: ekena naṅgalena kasantassa satta sītāyaḥ gacchanti iti

original: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro aññataraṁ sabbatthakaṁ mahāmattaṁ āmantesi—
analyzed: atha kho rājā māgadhaḥ seniyaḥ bimbisāraḥ aññataram sabbatthakam mahāmattam āmantesi

analyzed: amhākam kira bhaṇe vijite bhaddiya nagare meṇḍakaḥ gahapati paṭivasati

original: Tassa evarūpo iddhānubhāvo—
analyzed: tassa evarūpaḥ iddha anubhāvaḥ

original: sīsaṁ nahāyitvā dhaññāgāraṁ sammajjāpetvā bahidvāre nisīdati, antalikkhā dhaññassa dhārā opatitvā dhaññāgāraṁ pūreti.
analyzed: sīsam nahāyitvā dhaññāgāram sammajjāpetvā bahidvāre nisīdati antalikkhā dhaññassa dhārā opatitvā dhaññāgāram pūreti

analyzed: bhariyāya pe

original: puttassa …
analyzed: puttassa

original: suṇisāya …
analyzed: su nisāya

analyzed: dāsassa evarūpaḥ iddha anubhāvaḥ ekena naṅgalena kasantassa satta sītāyaḥ gacchanti iti

original: Gaccha, bhaṇe, jānāhi.
analyzed: gaccha bhaṇe jānāhi

original: Yathā mayā sāmaṁ diṭṭho, evaṁ tava diṭṭho bhavissatī”ti.
analyzed: yathā mayā sāmam diṭṭhaḥ evam tava diṭṭhaḥ bhavissati iti

original: “Evaṁ, devā”ti kho so mahāmatto rañño māgadhassa seniyassa bimbisārassa paṭissuṇitvā caturaṅginiyā senāya yena bhaddiyaṁ tena pāyāsi.
analyzed: eva deva ati kho saḥ mahāmattaḥ raññaḥ māgadhassa seniyassa bimbisārassa paṭissuṇitvā caturaṅginiyā senāya yena bhaddiyam tena pāyāsi

original: Anupubbena yena bhaddiyaṁ yena meṇḍako gahapati tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā meṇḍakaṁ gahapatiṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: anupubbena yena bhaddiyam yena meṇḍakaḥ gahapati tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā meṇḍakam gahapatim etat avoca

original: “ahañhi, gahapati, raññā āṇatto—
analyzed: ahañhi gahapati raññā āṇatto

original: ‘amhākaṁ kira, bhaṇe, vijite bhaddiyanagare meṇḍako gahapati paṭivasati, tassa evarūpo iddhānubhāvo, sīsaṁ nahāyitvā …pe…
analyzed: amhākam kira bhaṇe vijite bhaddiya nagare meṇḍakaḥ gahapati paṭivasati tassa evarūpaḥ iddha anubhāvaḥ sīsam nahāyitvā pe

original: bhariyāya …
analyzed: bhariyāya

original: puttassa …
analyzed: puttassa

original: suṇisāya …
analyzed: su nisāya

original: dāsassa evarūpo iddhānubhāvo, ekena naṅgalena kasantassa satta sītāyo gacchantīti, gaccha, bhaṇe, jānāhi.
analyzed: dāsassa evarūpaḥ iddha anubhāvaḥ ekena naṅgalena kasantassa satta sītāyaḥ gacchanti iti gaccha bhaṇe jānāhi

original: Yathā mayā sāmaṁ diṭṭho, evaṁ tava diṭṭho bhavissatī’ti.
analyzed: yathā mayā sāmam diṭṭhaḥ evam tava diṭṭhaḥ bhavissati iti

original: Passāma te, gahapati, iddhānubhāvan”ti.
analyzed: passāma te gahapati iddha anubhāvanti

original: Atha kho meṇḍako gahapati sīsaṁ nahāyitvā dhaññāgāraṁ sammajjāpetvā bahidvāre nisīdi, antalikkhā dhaññassa dhārā opatitvā dhaññāgāraṁ pūresi.
analyzed: atha kho meṇḍakaḥ gahapati sīsam nahāyitvā dhaññāgāram sammajjāpetvā bahidvāre nisīdi antalikkhā dhaññassa dhārā opatitvā dhaññāgāram pūresi

original: “Diṭṭho te, gahapati, iddhānubhāvo.
analyzed: diṭṭhaḥ te gahapati iddha anubhāvaḥ

original: Bhariyāya te iddhānubhāvaṁ passissāmā”ti.
analyzed: bhariyāya te iddha anubhāvam passissāma ati

original: Atha kho meṇḍako gahapati bhariyaṁ āṇāpesi—
analyzed: atha khalu meṇḍakaḥ gahapati bhariyam āṇāpesi

original: “tena hi caturaṅginiṁ senaṁ bhattena parivisā”ti.
analyzed: tena hi caturaṅginim senam bhattena parivisāti

original: Atha kho meṇḍakassa gahapatissa bhariyā ekaṁyeva āḷhakathālikaṁ upanisīditvā ekañca sūpabhiñjanakaṁ caturaṅginiṁ senaṁ bhattena parivisi, na tāva taṁ khiyyati, yāva sā na vuṭṭhāti.
analyzed: atha kho meṇḍakassa gahapatissa bhariyā ekayā iva āḷhaka thālikam upanisīditvā ekam ca su upabhiñjanakam caturaṅginim senam bhattena parivisi na tāva tam khiyyati yāva sā na vuṭṭhāti

original: “Diṭṭho te, gahapati, bhariyāyapi iddhānubhāvo.
analyzed: diṭṭhaḥ te gahapati iddha anubhāvaḥ

original: Puttassa te iddhānubhāvaṁ passissāmā”ti.
analyzed: puttassa te iddha anubhāvam passissāma ati

original: Atha kho meṇḍako gahapati puttaṁ āṇāpesi—
analyzed: atha kho meṇḍakaḥ gahapati puttam āṇāpesi

original: “tena hi caturaṅginiyā senāya chamāsikaṁ vetanaṁ dehī”ti.
analyzed: tena hi caturaṅginiyā senāya cha māsikam vetanam dehi iti

original: Atha kho meṇḍakassa gahapatissa putto ekaṁyeva sahassathavikaṁ gahetvā caturaṅginiyā senāya chamāsikaṁ vetanaṁ adāsi, na tāva taṁ khiyyati, yāvassa hatthagatā.
analyzed: atha kho meṇḍakassa gahapatissa puttaḥ ekayā iva sahassa thavikam gahetvā caturaṅginiyā senāya cha māsikam vetanam adāsi na tāva tam khiyyati yāva assa hattha gatā

original: “Diṭṭho te, gahapati, puttassapi iddhānubhāvo.
analyzed: diṭṭhaḥ te gahapati puttassa api iddha anubhāvaḥ

original: Suṇisāya te iddhānubhāvaṁ passissāmā”ti.
analyzed: suṇisāya te iddha anubhāvam passissāma ati

original: Atha kho meṇḍako gahapati suṇisaṁ āṇāpesi—
analyzed: atha khalu meṇḍakaḥ gahapati suṇisam āṇāpesi

original: “tena hi caturaṅginiyā senāya chamāsikaṁ bhattaṁ dehī”ti.
analyzed: tena hi caturaṅginiyā senāya cha māsikam bhattam dehi iti

original: Atha kho meṇḍakassa gahapatissa suṇisā ekaṁyeva catudoṇikaṁ piṭakaṁ upanisīditvā caturaṅginiyā senāya chamāsikaṁ bhattaṁ adāsi, na tāva taṁ khiyyati yāva sā na vuṭṭhāti.
analyzed: atha kho meṇḍakassa gahapatissa suṇisā ekayā iva catu doṇikam piṭakam upanisīditvā caturaṅginiyā senāya cha māsikam bhattam adāsi na tāva tam khiyyati yāva sā na vuṭṭhāti

original: “Diṭṭho te, gahapati, suṇisāyapi iddhānubhāvo.
analyzed: diṭṭhaḥ te gahapati iddha anubhāvaḥ

original: Dāsassa te iddhānubhāvaṁ passissāmā”ti.
analyzed: dāsassa te iddha anubhāvam passissāma ati

original: “Mayhaṁ kho, sāmi, dāsassa iddhānubhāvo khette passitabbo”ti.
analyzed: mayham kho sāmi dāsassa iddha anubhāvaḥ khette passitabbo ti

original: “Alaṁ, gahapati, diṭṭho te dāsassapi iddhānubhāvo”ti.
analyzed: ala gahapati diṭṭhaḥ te dāsassa api iddha anubhāvaḥ ti

original: Atha kho so mahāmatto caturaṅginiyā senāya punadeva rājagahaṁ paccāgañchi.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ mahāmatto caturaṅginiyā senāya punadeva rājagaham paccāgañchi

original: Yena rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā rañño māgadhassa seniyassa bimbisārassa etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
analyzed: yena rājā māgadhaḥ seniyaḥ bimbisāro tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā raññaḥ māgadhassa seniyassa bimbisārassa etam attham ārocesi

original: Atha kho bhagavā vesāliyaṁ yathābhirantaṁ viharitvā yena bhaddiyaṁ tena cārikaṁ pakkāmi mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ aḍḍhatelasehi bhikkhusatehi.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā vesāliyam yathābhirantam viharitvā yena bhaddiyam tena cārikam pakkāmi mahatā bhikkhu saṅghena saddhim aḍḍhatelasehi bhikkhu satehi

original: Atha kho bhagavā anupubbena cārikaṁ caramāno yena bhaddiyaṁ tadavasari.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā anupubbena cārikam caramānaḥ yena bhaddiyam tat avasari

original: Tatra sudaṁ bhagavā bhaddiye viharati jātiyā vane.
analyzed: tatra sudam bhagavā bhaddiye viharati jātiyā vane

original: Assosi kho meṇḍako gahapati—
analyzed: assosi kho meṇḍakaḥ gahapati

original: “samaṇo khalu bho gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulā pabbajito bhaddiyaṁ anuppatto bhaddiye viharati jātiyā vane.
analyzed: samaṇaḥ khalu bho gotamaḥ sakya putto sakya kulā pabbajitaḥ bhaddiyam anuppattaḥ bhaddiye viharati jātiyā vane

original: Taṁ kho pana bhagavantaṁ gotamaṁ evaṁ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato—
analyzed: tam kha pana bhagavantam gotamam evam kalyāṇaḥ kitti saddaḥ abbhuggataḥ

original: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā’.
analyzed: iti pi saḥ bhagavā araham sammāsambuddhaḥ vijjā caraṇa sampanno sugataḥ loka vidū anuttaraḥ purisa damma sārathi satthā deva manussānam buddhaḥ bhagavā

original: So imaṁ lokaṁ sadevakaṁ samārakaṁ sabrahmakaṁ sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṁ pajaṁ sadevamanussaṁ sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedeti.
analyzed: saḥ imam lokam sa devakam sa mārakam sa brahmakam sa ssamaṇa brāhmaṇim pajam sa deva manussam sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedeti

original: So dhammaṁ deseti ādikalyāṇaṁ majjhekalyāṇaṁ pariyosānakalyāṇaṁ sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ kevalaparipuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ pakāseti.
analyzed: saḥ dhammam deseti ādi kalyāṇam majjhe kalyāṇam pariyosāna kalyāṇam sa attham sa byañjanam kevala paripuṇṇam parisuddham brahmacariyam pakāseti

original: Sādhu kho pana tathārūpānaṁ arahataṁ dassanaṁ hotī”ti.
analyzed: sādhu kho pana tathārūpānam arahatam dassanam hoti iti

original: Atha kho meṇḍako gahapati bhadrāni bhadrāni yānāni yojāpetvā bhadraṁ bhadraṁ yānaṁ abhiruhitvā bhadrehi bhadrehi yānehi bhaddiyā niyyāsi bhagavantaṁ dassanāya.
analyzed: atha khalu meṇḍakaḥ gahapati bhadrāni bhadrāni yānāni yojāpetvā bhadram bhadram yānam abhiruhitvā bhadrehi bhadrehi yānehi bhaddiyā niyyāsi bhagavantam dassanāya

original: Addasaṁsu kho sambahulā titthiyā meṇḍakaṁ gahapatiṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ, disvāna meṇḍakaṁ gahapatiṁ etadavocuṁ—
analyzed: kho sambahulāḥ titthiyāḥ meṇḍakam gahapatim dūratas uva āgacchanta disvāna meṇḍakam gahapatim etat avocuḥ

original: “kahaṁ tvaṁ, gahapati, gacchasī”ti?
analyzed: kaham tva gahapati gacchasi iti

original: “Gacchāmahaṁ, bhante, bhagavantaṁ samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ dassanāyā”ti.
analyzed: gacchāmaha bhante bhagavantam samaṇam gotamam dassanāya ati

original: “Kiṁ pana tvaṁ, gahapati, kiriyavādo samāno akiriyavādaṁ samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ dassanāya upasaṅkamissasi?
analyzed: kim pana tva gahapati kiriya vādaḥ samānaḥ a kiriya vādam samaṇam gotamam dassanāya upasaṅkamissasi

original: Samaṇo hi, gahapati, gotamo akiriyavādo akiriyāya dhammaṁ deseti, tena ca sāvake vinetī”ti.
analyzed: samaṇaḥ hi gahapati gotamaḥ a kiriya vādaḥ a kiriyāya dhammam deseti tena ca sāvake vineti iti

original: Atha kho meṇḍakassa gahapatissa etadahosi—
analyzed: atha kho meṇḍakassa gahapatissa etat ahosi

original: “nissaṁsayaṁ kho so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho bhavissati, yathayime titthiyā usūyantī”ti.
analyzed: nissasayam kho so bhagavā araham sammāsambuddhaḥ bhavissati yathā ime titthiyāḥ usūyanti iti

original: Yāvatikā yānassa bhūmi, yānena gantvā yānā paccorohitvā pattikova yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: yāvatikā yānassa bhūmi yānena gantvā yānā paccorohitvā pattikā uva yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinnassa kho meṇḍakassa gahapatissa bhagavā anupubbiṁ kathaṁ kathesi, seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnassa kho meṇḍakassa gahapatissa bhagavā anupubbim katham kathesi

original: dānakathaṁ …pe…
analyzed: dāna katham pe

original: aparappaccayo satthusāsane bhagavantaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: apara ppaccayaḥ satthu sāsane bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “abhikkantaṁ, bhante …pe…
analyzed: abhikkanta bhante pe

original: upāsakaṁ maṁ bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gataṁ.
analyzed: upāsakam mam bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇa upetam saraṇam gata

original: Adhivāsetu ca me, bhante, bhagavā svātanāya bhattaṁ saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghenā”ti.
analyzed: adhivāsetu ca me bhante bhagavā svātanāya bhattam saddhim bhikkhu saṅghena ati

original: Adhivāsesi bhagavā tuṇhībhāvena.
analyzed: adhivāsesi bhagavā tuṇhībhāvena

original: Atha kho meṇḍako gahapati bhagavato adhivāsanaṁ viditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
analyzed: atha kho meṇḍakaḥ gahapati bhagavataḥ adhivāsanam viditvā uṭṭhāya āsanā bhagavantam abhivādetvā padakkhiṇam katvā pakkāmi

original: Atha kho meṇḍako gahapati tassā rattiyā accayena paṇītaṁ khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ paṭiyādāpetvā bhagavato kālaṁ ārocāpesi—“kālo, bhante, niṭṭhitaṁ bhattan”ti.
analyzed: atha kho meṇḍakaḥ gahapati tassāḥ rattiyāḥ accayena paṇītam khādanīyam bhojanīyam paṭiyādāpetvā bhagavato kālam ārocāpesi kālaḥ bhante niṭṭhitam bhattanti

original: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena meṇḍakassa gahapatissa nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghena.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya yena meṇḍakassa gahapatissa nivesanam tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi saddhim bhikkhu saṅghena

original: Atha kho meṇḍakassa gahapatissa bhariyā ca putto ca suṇisā ca dāso ca yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu.
analyzed: atha kho meṇḍakassa gahapatissa bhariyā ca putto ca suṇisā ca dāsaḥ ca yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdisu

original: Tesaṁ bhagavā anupubbiṁ kathaṁ kathesi, seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: tesam bhagavā anupubbim katham kathesi

original: dānakathaṁ …pe…
analyzed: dāna katham pe

original: aparappaccayā satthusāsane bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ—
analyzed: aparappaccayā satthu sāsane bhagavantam etat avocuḥ

original: “abhikkantaṁ, bhante …pe…
analyzed: abhikkanta bhante pe

original: ete mayaṁ, bhante, bhagavantaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāma dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
analyzed: ete bhante bhagavantam saraṇam gacchāma dhammañca bhikkhu saṅghañca

original: Upāsake no bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupete saraṇaṁ gate”ti.
analyzed: upāsake naḥ bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupete saraṇam gata iti

original: Atha kho meṇḍako gahapati buddhappamukhaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena
analyzed: atha kho meṇḍakaḥ gahapati buddha ppamukham bhikkhu saṅgham paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena

original: sahatthā santappetvā sampavāretvā bhagavantaṁ bhuttāviṁ onītapattapāṇiṁ ekamantaṁ

original: nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho meṇḍako gahapati bhagavantaṁ etadavoca—

original: “yāva, bhante, bhagavā bhaddiye viharati tāva ahaṁ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dhuvabhattenā”ti.

original: Atha kho bhagavā meṇḍakaṁ gahapatiṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṁsetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā meṇḍakam gahapatim dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahasetvā uṭṭhāya āsanā pakkāmi

original: 22. Pañcagorasādianujānana
Atha kho bhagavā bhaddiye yathābhirantaṁ viharitvā meṇḍakaṁ gahapatiṁ anāpucchā yena aṅguttarāpo tena cārikaṁ pakkāmi mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ aḍḍhatelasehi bhikkhusatehi.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā bhaddiye yathābhirantam viharitvā meṇḍakam gahapatim anāpucchā yena aṅguttarāpo tena cārikam pakkāmi mahatā bhikkhu saṅghena saddhim aḍḍhatelasehi bhikkhu satehi

original: Assosi kho meṇḍako gahapati—
analyzed: assosi kho meṇḍakaḥ gahapati

original: “bhagavā kira yena aṅguttarāpo tena cārikaṁ pakkanto mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ aḍḍhatelasehi bhikkhusatehī”ti.
analyzed: bhagavā kira yena aṅguttarāpo tena cārikam pakkantaḥ mahatā bhikkhu saṅghena saddhim aḍḍhatelasehi bhikkhu satehi iti

original: Atha kho meṇḍako gahapati dāse ca kammakare ca āṇāpesi—
analyzed: atha kho meṇḍakaḥ gahapati dāse ca kammakare ca āṇāpesi

original: “tena hi, bhaṇe, bahuṁ loṇampi, telampi, taṇḍulampi, khādanīyampi sakaṭesu āropetvā
analyzed: tena hi bhaṇe bahum loṇam pi telam pi taṇḍulam pi khādanīyam pi sakaṭesu āropetvā

original: āgacchatha, aḍḍhatelasāni ca gopālakasatāni aḍḍhatelasāni ca dhenusatāni ādāya āgacchantu,

analyzed: yattha bhagavantam passissāma tattha taruṇena khīrena bhojessāma ati

original: Atha kho meṇḍako gahapati yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi.
analyzed: atha kho meṇḍakaḥ gahapati yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam aṭṭhāsi

original: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho meṇḍako gahapati bhagavantaṁ etadavoca—

original: “adhivāsetu me, bhante, bhagavā svātanāya bhattaṁ saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghenā”ti.
analyzed: adhivāsetu me bhante bhagavā svātanāya bhattam saddhim bhikkhu saṅghena ati

original: Adhivāsesi bhagavā tuṇhībhāvena.
analyzed: adhivāsesi bhagavā tuṇhībhāvena

original: Atha kho meṇḍako gahapati bhagavato adhivāsanaṁ viditvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.

original: Atha kho meṇḍako gahapati tassā rattiyā accayena paṇītaṁ khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ paṭiyādāpetvā bhagavato kālaṁ ārocāpesi—“kālo, bhante, niṭṭhitaṁ bhattan”ti.
analyzed: atha kho meṇḍakaḥ gahapati tassāḥ rattiyāḥ accayena paṇītam khādanīyam bhojanīyam paṭiyādāpetvā bhagavato kālam ārocāpesi kālaḥ bhante niṭṭhitam bhattanti

original: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena meṇḍakassa gahapatissa parivesanā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghena.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya yena meṇḍakassa gahapatissa parivesanā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi saddhim bhikkhu saṅghena

original: Atha kho meṇḍako gahapati aḍḍhatelasāni gopālakasatāni āṇāpesi—
analyzed: atha kho meṇḍakaḥ gahapati aḍḍhatelasāni gopālaka satāni āṇāpesi

original: “tena hi, bhaṇe, ekamekaṁ dhenuṁ gahetvā ekamekassa bhikkhuno upatiṭṭhatha taruṇena khīrena bhojessāmā”ti.

analyzed: atha kho meṇḍakaḥ gahapati buddha ppamukham bhikkhu saṅgham paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappesi sampavāresi taruṇena ca khīrena

analyzed: bhikkhū kukkuccāyantā khīram na paṭiggaṇhanti

analyzed: paṭiggaṇhatha bhikkhave paribhuñjatha ati

original: Atha kho meṇḍako gahapati buddhappamukhaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena

original: sahatthā santappetvā sampavāretvā taruṇena ca khīrena bhagavantaṁ bhuttāviṁ onītapattapāṇiṁ ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: sahatthā santappetvā sampavāretvā taruṇena ca khīrena bhagavantam bhuttāvim onīta patta pāṇim ekamantam nisīdi

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho meṇḍako gahapati bhagavantaṁ etadavoca—

original: Atha kho bhagavā meṇḍakaṁ gahapatiṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṁsetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā meṇḍakam gahapatim dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahasetvā uṭṭhāya āsanā pakkāmi
